text: Giacomo Girolamo Casanova (,"Casanova, Giovanni Jacopo" (US) and ; 2 April 1725 â€“ 4 June 1798) was a famous Venetian adventurer and writer. He was born in Venice. He is best known for having had many affairs with women. He died in Dux, Bohemia, (now Duchcov, Czech Republic). ==References== Category:18th- century Italian writers Category:1725 births Category:1798 deaths Category:People from Venice
title: Giacomo Casanova
